sentences.en: " I will keep thy secret, as I have his,'said Hester.
sentences.cn: “ 我将像为他保密一样来为你保密, ” 海丝特说.

sentences.en: " The impulse of thy strength, only less free Than thou, 0 Uncontrollable! "
sentences.cn: 假如我分有你的脉搏, 仅仅不如你那么自由, 哦,无法约束的生命!

sentences.en: " Thou hast kept the secret of thy paramour.
sentences.cn: “ 你始终不肖泄露你的奸夫.

sentences.en: And I answered him, "I will go for half of thy treasure.
sentences.cn: 我于是回答他，‘我只为你的半壁财宝而离开。

sentences.en: And thereon spend thy many brittle darts.
sentences.cn: 把你的利箭耗费在他们身上.

sentences.en: Doth thy sentence bind thee to wear the token in thy sleep?
sentences.cn: 判决是不是规定你睡觉时也要佩着那标记?

sentences.en: Honour thy father and thy mother.
I am no son of thine to do thy bidding.
sentences.cn: 我不是你的儿子,不要听你的吩咐.

sentences.en: I am Robin Hood, as thy caitiff carcase soon shall know. "
sentences.cn: 我乃罗宾汉是也, 你这匹夫马上就会知道我的厉害. ”

sentences.en: I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice.
sentences.cn: 主啊，我属于您，我已经听见您的声音。

sentences.en: It was my folly, and thy weakness.
sentences.cn: 那就是我的愚蠢和你的软弱。

sentences.en: Make thy love larger to enlarge my worth.
sentences.cn: 听着这话,我要从羞愧中站起./扩大些你的爱,好提高些我的价值.

sentences.en: She is in thy bosom; and I am in hell for evermore.
sentences.cn: 现在她走进了你的怀抱, 而我却永远地,永远地堕入了地狱.

sentences.en: Then came to him the disciples of John, saying, Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft, but thy disciples fast not?
sentences.cn: 那时，约翰的门徒来见耶稣说，我们和法利赛人常常禁食，你的门徒倒不禁食，这是为什么呢。

sentences.en: Thou mayest cover up thy secret from the prying multitude.
sentences.cn: 你可以对那些刨根问底的群众隐藏你的秘密.

sentences.en: Thou wilt find, Eternal Traveller, marks of thy footsteps across my songs.
sentences.cn: “永恒的旅客”呀, 你可以在我的歌众找到你的足迹.

sentences.en: Though thy enemy seem a mouse, yet watch him like a lion.
sentences.cn: 敌人即使像老鼠, 也要当作狮子防.

trans.tran_cn: （用作第二人称单数所有格形式）你的
